attributes.action: open up a factory making chocochops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chocochops are a chocolate chop on a real chop bone. It's a fantastic product with an already existing market base. Starting up such a factory is a great method of engaging in countercyclical spending in these recessionary times.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
